mosinstall.name: ContXTD
mosinstall.author: clockbit.com
mosinstall.copyright: This component is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: Contacts XTD is a component for Mambo 4.5.2 and derived from the Mambo Contacts Component. It offers some much requested enhancements, such as company name, website, mobile phone and more.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__contxtd_details` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `con_position` varchar(100) default NULL, `company` varchar(100) default NULL, `address` text, `suburb` varchar(50) default NULL, `state` varchar(20) default NULL, `country` varchar(50) default NULL, `postcode` varchar(10) default NULL, `telephone1` varchar(25) default NULL, `telephone2` varchar(25) default NULL, `fax` varchar(25) default NULL, `mobile1` varchar(25) default NULL, `mobile2` varchar(25) default NULL, `website` varchar(100) default NULL, `misc1` mediumtext, `misc2` mediumtext, `image` varchar(100) default NULL, `imagepos` varchar(20) default NULL, `email_to` varchar(100) default NULL, `default_con` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `params` text NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `catid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `access` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
